actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to review the suitability for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System of the Everglades expansion area.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to report on the suitability for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System of any part of the Everglades expansion area. Makes such requirement effective: (1) on submission to the Congress of the proposed plan to restore and preserve the South Florida ecosystem required by the Water Resources Development Act of 1996; but (2) only if such plan does not specify that construction and water storage are required in the expansion area (as determined by the Secretary).

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to review the suitability for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System of the Everglades expansion area.
